official_title: Self-Care for Head and Neck Cancer Survivors With Lymphedema and Fibrosis
inclusion_criteria:
* Post HNC primary treatment
* No evidence of cancer (NED)
* No more than 6 months after completion of initial lymphedema therapy for head and neck lymphedema
* > 18 years of age
* Ability to understand English in order to complete questionnaires
* Able to complete the onsite training and home self-care activities for LEF management
* Able to provide informed consent
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: â€¢ Patients will be excluded if they have any of the following medical conditions that would prohibit the safe implementation of self-care of LEF: recurrent or metastatic cancer; any other active cancer; acute infection; congestive heart failure; renal failure; cardiac or pulmonary edema; sensitive carotid sinus; severe carotid blockage; and uncontrolled hypertension
